loyaltyCta.heading: Extra benefits for returning guests
loyaltyCta.body: Join our direct-booking list to get early-access offers, seasonal travel tips, and an extra 5% discount code for your next reservation on our website.

mission.heading: Our mission
paragraphs: Since 1995, Hostel Brikette has helped travellers experience Positano on a reasonable budget — without giving up panoramic Amalfi Coast views.
We prioritise transparency: clear rates with no hidden fees, straightforward policies, and an on-site team ready to help with changes or special requests.
Our local team shares transport plans, tips for handling 23 kg / 50 lb luggage on the stairs, and activity ideas so you can enjoy every minute on the coast.

items.title: Fair, direct and transparent
items.body: We publish clear prices and policies, steer you to the best-value options, and never add hidden fees.

items.title: Local knowledge, shared freely
items.body: From ferries to footpaths, our team offers practical advice so you make the most of your time (and budget).

items.title: Warm hospitality
items.body: We celebrate the social spirit of hostelling: a friendly bar, communal spaces, and staff who remember your plans.

hiringCta.heading: Work with us on the terrace
hiringCta.body: Join a small team that values character, initiative and guest care. Staff housing, breakfast, and fair perks included.

meetTheHosts.heading: Meet the terrace team
meetTheHosts.intro: These are the people who keep the terrace lively, host sunset events, lead hikes, and answer your questions even before you arrive in Positano.

hosts.name: Chiara
hosts.bio: Coordinates the sunset bar, introduces local producers, and makes sure every tasting includes something for everyone. If you’re celebrating or planning a private event, talk to her on the terrace from 6 pm.
hosts.imageAlt: Chiara serving spritz on the terrace bar.
hosts.availability: Find Chiara at the bar most evenings and via our digital concierge.

hosts.name: Luca
hosts.bio: Born in Praiano, he knows every trail on the Amalfi Coast. Luca helps you choose between the Path of the Gods, sunrise boat rides, or day trips to Ravello — with transport plans ready to go.
hosts.imageAlt: Luca pointing toward the horizon from an Amalfi Coast viewpoint.
hosts.availability: Catch him at reception early mornings, or reserve hike spots through the concierge.

hosts.name: Mariana
hosts.bio: Replies over WhatsApp and Messenger with ferry alerts, restaurant tips, and last-minute reminders. If the weather changes, she sends low-stress alternatives.
hosts.imageAlt: Phone screen showing a chat with Mariana, the digital concierge.
hosts.availability: Message any time — she coordinates with the reception team in real time.
